## Properties

| Property           | Attribute          | Description                                                                                                     | Type     | Default |
| ------------------ | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `colourscheme`     | `colourscheme`     | The colours for the background & text of <project-heading>, separated with a comma. eg "text colour, bg colour" | `string` | `""`    |
| `pagetitlecolours` | `pagetitlecolours` | The colours for the <h1> heading, separated with a comma. eg "h1 colour, bg colour"                             | `string` | `""`    |
